definitions.title: The Orange Mash of Destiny
definitions.description: A glowing spoon of mashed carrot approaches like a comet from the heavens. History will remember this bite.

choices.text: Grab the spoon with both hands and smear victory everywhere
Freeze, inspect, and only then allow one cautious taste
Accept it calmly like a tiny diplomat
Close your mouth and demand the old menu

definitions.title: The Other Baby in the Glass
definitions.description: A shining mirror reveals a rival infant of suspiciously equal power. Contact is inevitable.

choices.text: Smile first and launch friendly diplomacy
Headbutt the mirror to test this impostor
Stare in stunned silence, gathering data
Burst into tears and seek immediate extraction

definitions.title: The Sky Drums
definitions.description: Thunder rolls across the world. The ceiling rumbles. Is this weather, or war?

choices.text: Laugh at the boom and kick your feet like a battle chief
Wail for immediate evacuation to trusted arms
Track every rumble in focused silence
Ignore the chaos and continue chewing your sleeve

definitions.title: The Thunder Beast Barks
definitions.description: A neighborhood dog unleashes a bark that shakes your tiny parliament.

choices.text: Laugh and bark back with full chest
Hide your face in a blanket bunker
Track the sound source without blinking
Ignore the beast and continue floor-rolling

definitions.title: The Vanishing Sock Incident
definitions.description: One sock disappears into the void. Suspicion falls on everyone.

choices.text: Conduct a crawling search of all nearby territory
Accept single-sock life with great dignity
Refuse to proceed until matching sock is restored
Wail dramatically at the injustice

definitions.title: The Great Vanishing Face
definitions.description: A familiar face disappears behind two hands. The universe pauses. Then the face returns with a shout.

choices.text: Explode into giggles and demand another round
Study the trick, then attempt your own stealth face-cover
Burst into tears at each disappearance
Remain stone-faced until performance quality improves

definitions.title: Oracle of the Ceiling Fan
definitions.description: The spinning blades above whisper ancient secrets in circles.

choices.text: Enter a trance and follow every rotation
Kick excitedly as the prophecy unfolds
Demand to be moved somewhere less mysterious
Ignore the fan and chew your sleeve with resolve

definitions.title: Symphony of the Wooden Spoon
definitions.description: A spoon strikes a bowl. The first great concert begins in your kitchen arena.

choices.text: Join in and percussion everything in reach
Listen carefully and mimic the rhythm
Cover your ears and demand silence
Nod politely, then crawl away from the performance

definitions.title: Siege of the Bathwater Kingdom
definitions.description: You are lowered into warm waters under bright lights. Rubber duck sentries stand by.

choices.text: Launch a tidal assault with both hands
Cry as if betrayed by civilization itself
Stare at bubbles with monk-like concentration
Attempt to drink the mysterious water

definitions.title: The Purple Puree Revelation
definitions.description: Today the spoon carries a suspiciously purple mash. Could this be fruit or wizardry?

choices.text: Open wide and embrace the unknown flavor
Smear it on tray first for texture analysis
Accept one bite, then reject all further terms
Refuse immediately and file formal complaint noises

definitions.title: Trial of the Stacking Cups
definitions.description: Colored cups are stacked into a tower. Gravity waits nearby with a grin.

choices.text: Carefully stack them higher than reason allows
Knock the tower down instantly for science
Sort cups by color with stern focus
Toss one cup and pursue it across the room

definitions.title: The Forbidden Gate
definitions.description: A baby gate blocks the hallway frontier. Beyond it lies unexplored carpet and legends.

choices.text: Test every corner for structural weakness
Retreat and reorganize your toy base camp
Summon help with dramatic shouting
Sit and quietly observe older humans using the mechanism

definitions.title: Descent of the Tiny Champion
definitions.description: A small slide towers over you like a polished mountain.

choices.text: Charge up and slide down immediately
Climb halfway, retreat, then plan a better run
Ask to be carried down with royal caution
Sit at the top and wave at everyone instead

definitions.title: Alarm of the Front Door
definitions.description: The doorbell rings. Strangers may be approaching the household stronghold.

choices.text: Rush toward the sound to inspect the arrivals
Freeze and watch from behind a trusted leg
Wave enthusiastically at whoever enters
Ignore visitors and continue your toy mission

definitions.title: Oath of the Stuffed Bear
definitions.description: A plush guardian is placed beside you for naps. This alliance could shape empires.

choices.text: Cling to the bear and refuse sleep without it
Offer the bear to a parent, then settle anyway
Interrogate the bear by chewing one ear
Ignore the bear and watch shadows on the wall

definitions.title: The Staircase of No Return
definitions.description: A staircase rises before you. A gate stands between you and legend.

choices.text: Rattle the gate and seek every weak point
Respect the barrier and patrol the lower floor
Call for help to begin the ascent together
Retreat to your blocks and abandon the campaign

definitions.title: Armor of the Raincoat
definitions.description: A crinkly raincoat is placed upon you before stepping outside. Mobility is... altered.

choices.text: Accept the armor and march into drizzle
Fight the sleeves like a trapped hero
Stand still until someone fixes every fold
Refuse the coat and demand fair weather

definitions.title: Flight Over the Playground
definitions.description: The swing rises. Wind hits your face. Gravity files a complaint.

choices.text: Demand higher altitude immediately
Grip the chains and ask to stop
Settle into a steady rhythm and hum
Scan every nearby kid and narrate silently

definitions.title: Council of the Sandpit
definitions.description: Your hands meet sand for the first time. Grains cling like tiny stars.

choices.text: Dig boldly and build a very serious mound
Sift each handful and inspect every grain
Panic when sand touches your fingers
Share your shovel and start a co-op castle

definitions.title: The Mud Pact
definitions.description: Your hands meet mud after rain. The earth itself offers a handshake.

choices.text: Dive in and sculpt a glorious mud monument
Pinch and inspect every texture with grave seriousness
Reject the mud and request immediate hand restoration
Smear one heroic streak, then panic about your fingers

definitions.title: The Noon Nap Uprising
definitions.description: A nap is declared by decree. You disagree with the government.

choices.text: Protest loudly from the crib rails
Negotiate by asking for one song, then sleep
Sleep instantly, no drama, no witnesses
Stay awake quietly and inspect the ceiling for hours

definitions.title: Quest for the Left Shoe
definitions.description: Departure is delayed. One shoe is missing. Time is running out.

choices.text: Search every room shouting tactical updates
Sit down and wait for adult logistics support
Wear mismatched shoes and proceed anyway
Refuse to move until the correct pair is assembled

definitions.title: Whispers in the Book Hall
definitions.description: You enter a quiet library where everyone speaks in hushed tones. The atmosphere is sacred.

choices.text: Whisper along and tiptoe like a tiny scholar
Point loudly at every colorful book you spot
Curl up in a reading corner and focus on pictures
Complain that silence is suspicious and retreat

definitions.title: The Rattle Treaty
definitions.description: Another toddler reaches for your prized rattle. Diplomacy is tested.

choices.text: Hand it over, then seek a new quest
Hold it tight and declare ownership with a roar
Offer a trade: rattle for blocks
Walk away from both toy and conflict

definitions.title: First Ride of the Tricycle
definitions.description: A tricycle awaits. Pedals gleam. Balance and glory are both on trial.

choices.text: Pedal furiously and trust momentum
Practice one careful push at a time
Demand a push from behind and wave like royalty
Step off after a wobble and declare the road cursed

definitions.title: Duel with the Shadow
definitions.description: Your shadow follows every move across the floor. It refuses to negotiate.

choices.text: Chase it relentlessly across the room
Study it calmly and test movement patterns
Invite a parent to help trap the shadow
Avoid stepping on it, just in case

definitions.title: The Sock and Cape Crisis
definitions.description: Clothing selection begins. Two socks appear. One cardboard tube appears. Destiny trembles.

choices.text: Accept the outfit and march onward
Insist the tube is a royal cape and reject all socks
Focus on putting one sock on perfectly
Cry because the blue sock touched the red sock

definitions.title: The Hidden Sticker Treasure
definitions.description: A sticker appears in your pocket like contraband from a distant kingdom.

choices.text: Place it proudly on your shirt as a badge
Save it for later in a very secret location
Offer it to someone and wait for a reaction
Peel and re-peel it until it loses all power

definitions.title: Campaign Through the Market
definitions.description: From the grocery cart throne, aisles pass like nations before a young ruler.

choices.text: Wave at every passerby with diplomatic confidence
Point at random items and issue urgent demands
Sit quietly and count bright packages
Ask to get down and walk your own route

definitions.title: Prophecy of the Puddle
definitions.description: A rain puddle reflects the sky. It may be a portal. It may also be cold.

choices.text: Jump in with unshakable conviction
Poke it with a stick first
Avoid it and keep shoes dry at all costs
Stand at the edge, fascinated by ripples

definitions.title: The Crumb Conspiracy
definitions.description: Cracker crumbs scatter across the table like a map to somewhere important.

choices.text: Methodically gather every crumb into one pile
Sweep crumbs dramatically onto the floor
Offer crumbs to a nearby ally as tribute
Refuse to continue until cleanup is complete

definitions.title: The Buttoned Pajama Trial
definitions.description: Bedtime pajamas present tiny buttons, each one a mechanical puzzle of honor.

choices.text: Attempt every button yourself, no surrender
Ask for help, then copy each step carefully
Get frustrated and demand instant speed mode
Lose focus halfway and start a new game instead

definitions.title: Siege of the Blanket Fortress
definitions.description: Night falls. Blankets are arranged. Final negotiations begin before the realm of sleep.

choices.text: Request one story and settle peacefully
Launch an emergency campaign for more water
Rearrange every pillow with strict precision
Fall asleep mid-sentence before terms are final

definitions.title: The Candle and the Wish
definitions.description: A candle flickers before you. Everyone waits as if fate itself needs your decision.

choices.text: Blow confidently on first attempt
Watch the flame carefully before acting
Laugh, clap, and let someone assist
Retreat from the tiny fire with concern

definitions.title: The Last Puzzle Before Three
definitions.description: A shape-sorter box appears like a final exam from the toddler gods.

choices.text: Rotate each piece until it fits perfectly
Try bold force and see what yields
Ask for a hint, then finish the rest
Abandon the puzzle and invent a new game

definitions.title: IGCSE Subject Selection
definitions.description: Choose your IGCSE subjects. You must select between 6 and 8 subjects.

choices.text: English Language
English Literature
Mathematics
Co-ordinated Sciences (Double)
History
Geography
Global Perspectives
French
Spanish
German
Mandarin
Computer Science
ICT
Business Studies
Economics
Art & Design
Music
Drama
Design & Technology
Physical Education
